# `scicomptools`

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of scicomptools is to house all of the standalone functions written by NCEAS Scientific Computing Team that lack a specific project. Currently contains various tools to import, summarize and analyze data

## Installation

You can install the development version of scicomptools from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("NCEAS/scicomptools")
```
